outputs.output_descr:
(1) COs supported to adopt Poverty and Environment initiatives.
 (2)  COs experience on the advancement of MDGs systematized and shared in the region.
 (3) New knowledge generated and shared with policy makers about the impact of the economic crisis on MDGs achievement.
outputs.output_title: MDG and Poverty Reducion in La

project_title: MDG's and Poverty Reduction in Latin America
